Yuyuko's fan.NAME: Yuyuko's fan
DESCRIPTIONS: Block will not disappear at your turn start, NL At start of battle, gain #b
#ySakura and #yButterfly into draw pile. NL At sleep in campfire,Gather 1 #yFan . On battle victory,lose HP of the number of current turns,at least remain 1 HP

Coronal.NAME: Coronal
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to use.Gain #b1 #yIntangible and #Artifact . Win #b5 battle to increase usage times.

Trap Lamp.NAME: Trap Lamp
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b3 turns,place a #yButterfly into draw pile

Blue Kimono (Sakura).NAME: Blue Kimono (Sakura)
DESCRIPTIONS: When draw #ySakura without extra effect,transform it to a #ySakura with random effect. NL #ySakra will deal #b3% HP loss of MaxHP to all enemies.

Blue Kimono (Butterfly).NAME: Blue Kimono (Butterfly)
DESCRIPTIONS: When draw #yButterfly without extra effect,transform it to a #yButterfly with random effect. NL #yButterfly will heal #b3% HP for you.

Blue Kimono (Phantom).NAME: Blue Kimono (Phantom)
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b3 turns, trigger #yPhantom extra. NL At the start of turn,place a #ySoul into hand.

Blue Kimono (FullMoon).NAME: Blue Kimono (FullMoon)
DESCRIPTIONS: Each stack of #yDiaphaneity will enhance #b1% effect. NL At the end of turn, every #b5 #yDiaphaneity of you will give 1 #yBLock ,every #b5 #yDiaphaneity of enemy will deal 1 HP loss

Obi.NAME: Obi
DESCRIPTIONS: Record you lost HP from YuyukoFan,Gain equal amount of #yDiaphaneity at the start of next battle.

Trip to Hell.NAME: Trip to Hell
DESCRIPTIONS: YuyukoFan will give double fan at the start of battle
